citations.narrative:
Housekeeping. The front section of the sheep pasture which is also used for pony rides on weekends has a number of
items laying on the ground or inside the enclosure. Items in this enclosure include a rake, shovel, loose strands of bale
twine, two tables, chairs, trash, and wood laying on the ground in upper right corner. Tools, furniture, trash, and
miscellaneous items in the sheep enclosure can cause injury to the animals. Premises must be kept clean and in good
repair to protect the animals from injury. Correct by April 24, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
Housekeeping. The front section of the sheep pasture which is also used for pony rides on weekends has a number of 
items laying on the ground or inside the enclosure. Items in this enclosure include a rake, shovel, loose strands of bale 
twine, two tables, chairs, trash, and wood laying on the ground in upper right corner. Tools, furniture, trash, and 
miscellaneous items in the sheep enclosure can cause injury to the animals. Premises must be kept clean and in good 
repair to protect the animals from injury. Correct by April 24, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
